text: Literally, comes with everything you'll need to complete a beautiful makeup job. I've tried plenty of different makeup brush kits in the past. This one is perfect. I love how soft the brushes are. The blush brush works great. Never any fraying. The angled eye brushes also work well. I can create a cat-eye or smokey eye look with these brushes no problem. I like that this set comes with a lip brush too. This set really does have every single brush you will need. You can place the brushes in the holes on the silicon brush cleaner while you're using. When I need to wash the brushes I apply a small amount of coconut oil and hot water on the rippled side of the brush cleaner. It helps remove any old makeup left behind. The foundation applicator works great. I get just the right amount of coverage I need. Never leaves any streaking on my face. Also, comes with an adorable hot pink bag to keep all your new brushes safe and put away. I like the purple on the top of the brushes as well. Gives the set a real girly look. I highly recommend.
